name: Stefy
testimonial: Two of my three children were fortunate enough to have Mrs Lifang Viray as their fourth grade teacher. Her knowledge and teaching style was beyond what we had expected. She is able to create an environment where students enjoy learning without even knowing they're learning. Lifang incorporates humor and fun in her daily teaching routine, and is very knowledgable in all subjects. Because of her, my children were well prepared for middle school and excel in all subjects. I truly believe that Lifang is dedicated to her job and the success of children. She will remain one of my kids' favorite teachers of all time!
